text:
What do you mean, you're not
who I think you are?
I just meant, um...

not as smart
as you thought I was.

I get it. There's a lot of
pressure on kids these days.

But if you'd done the reading,
that quiz should've been easy.

I know, and I'll do
better next time. Really.

You're one of my best students,
Harper,

which is why
I'm going to allow you
to take a make-up quiz tomorrow.
This time? Come prepared.

- Fair?
- Yes, ma'am. Very fair.

Hey, nice save. So, listen,
I've been thinking--

No, Griffin.
I can't do this anymore.

I'm a nervous wreck.
Every second I stay here

is just another chance
I'll get caught. And then what?

But you've been doing
so great.
Great? Until this morning,

I didn't even know
we had 50 states.

Alaska and Hawaii?
When did that happen?
I don't know. A while ago.

Look, I was thinking about
what you said earlier.

Topher told you
he was sleepwalking?

Yes. He woke up this morning
covered in mud.

Said something about
eating worms.

- Worms?
- Yeah.

See, that's pretty weird
even for him.

I mean, he's got to be
hiding something.

The crystal?
Griffin, I told you.

- I already searched his room.
- You said you were interrupted.

Yes. And I was almost caught.
It's too risky.

Look, do you want
to go home or not?
